column5: I have officially spent more days/time working on the boat than in it fishing lol  Looking good and only a couple minor things to do. Going to be nice actually fishing in it. I start my holidays on Saturday and we are heading up to Big Rideau lake again for a blissful week on the island, love that place. So, all the work on the boat will be able to be enjoyed. Looking forward to posting lots of big Laker pics.  This year I'm predicting a PB in the 30lb range.
Fishing cures all ailments!   get out there and enjoy the day in your boat!
Sounds like u have a well deserved break coming up, heres to good weather and great fishing
Try sitting with a bunch of fellas and watching them fish, and you cant.LOL Soon I,ll be able to get back at it. Another couple weeks to go.  Get out there and enjoy Matt.

I know the feeling, Matt.  The son has his boat running all over on the weekend looking for bass. Grampa here, on the other hand, has been too busy with his new grandfatherly duties to go fishing. Closest I'm getting to fishing is the fresh pot of "fish head" chowder I cooked up tonight.
